verses.verse: "Listen<WH8085> to me,<WH7291> you who follow after righteousness,<WH6664> you who seek<WH1245> Yahweh:<WH3068> look<WH5027> to the rock<WH6697> you were cut<WH2672> from,<WH4718> and to the hold of the pit<WH953> you were dug from.<WH5365>
Look<WH5027> to Abraham<WH85> your father,<WH1> and to Sarah<WH8283> who bore<WH2342> you;<WH259> for when he was but one I called<WH7121> him,<WH1288> and I blessed him,<WH7235> and made him many.

For Yahweh<WH3068> has comforted<WH5162> Zion;<WH6726> he has comforted<WH5162> all her waste places,<WH2723> and has made<WH7760> her wilderness<WH4057> like Eden,<WH5731> and her desert<WH6160> like the garden<WH1588> of Yahweh;<WH3068> joy<WH8342> and gladness<WH8057> shall be found<WH4672> therein,<WH8426> thanksgiving, and the voice<WH6963> of melody.<WH2172>

"Attend<WH7181> to me,<WH5971> my people; and give ear<WH238> to me,<WH3816> my nation: for a law<WH8451> shall go forth<WH3318> from me,<WH7280> and I will establish my justice<WH4941> for a light<WH216> of the peoples.<WH5971>

My righteousness<WH6664> is near,<WH7138> my salvation<WH3468> is gone forth,<WH3318> and my arms<WH2220> shall judge<WH8199> the peoples;<WH5971> the islands<WH339> shall wait<WH6960> for me,<WH2220> and on my arm shall they trust.<WH3176>

Lift up<WH5375> your eyes<WH5869> to the heavens,<WH8064> and look<WH5027> on the earth<WH776> beneath;<WH8064> for the heavens shall vanish away<WH4414> like smoke,<WH6227> and the earth<WH776> shall wax old<WH1086> like a garment;<WH899> and those who dwell<WH3427> therein shall die<WH4191> in the same<WH3644> way:<WH3654> but my salvation<WH3444> shall be forever,<WH5769> and my righteousness<WH6666> shall not be abolished.<WH2865>

"Listen<WH8085> to me,<WH3045> you who know righteousness,<WH6664> the people<WH5971> in whose heart<WH3820> is my law;<WH8451> don't<WH3372> fear the reproach<WH2781> of men,<WH582> neither be dismayed<WH2865> at their insults.<WH1421>

For the moth<WH6211> shall eat them up<WH398> like a garment,<WH899> and the worm<WH5580> shall eat<WH398> them like wool;<WH6785> but my righteousness<WH6666> shall be forever,<WH5769> and my salvation<WH3444> to all generations.<WH1755>"

Awake,<WH5782> awake,<WH5782> put on<WH3847> strength,<WH5797> arm<WH2220> of Yahweh;<WH3068> awake,<WH5782> as in the days<WH3117> of old,<WH5769> the generations<WH1755> of ancient<WH6924> times.<WH2672> Isn't it you who cut Rahab<WH7294> in pieces,<WH2490> who pierced the monster?<WH8577>

Isn't<WH2717> it you who dried up the sea,<WH3220> the waters<WH4325> of the great<WH7227> deep;<WH8415> who made<WH7760> the depths<WH4615> of the sea<WH3220> a way<WH1870> for the redeemed<WH1350> to pass over?<WH5674>

The ransomed<WH6299> of Yahweh<WH3068> shall return,<WH7725> and come<WH935> with singing<WH7440> to Zion;<WH6726> and everlasting<WH5769> joy<WH8057> shall be on their heads.<WH7218> They shall obtain<WH5381> gladness<WH8342> and joy.<WH8057> Sorrow<WH3015> and sighing<WH585> shall flee away.<WH5127>

"I,<WH5162> even I, am he who comforts you:<WH3372> who are you, that you are afraid of man<WH582> who shall die,<WH4191> and of the son<WH1121> of man<WH120> who shall be made<WH5414> as grass;<WH2682>

and have forgotten<WH7911> Yahweh<WH3068> your Maker,<WH6213> who stretched forth<WH5186> the heavens,<WH8064> and laid the foundations<WH3245> of the earth;<WH776> and fear<WH6342> continually<WH8548> all the day<WH3117> because<WH6440> of the fury<WH2534> of the oppressor,<WH6693> when<WH834> he makes ready<WH3559> to destroy?<WH7843> and where is the fury<WH2534> of the oppressor?<WH6693>
The captive exile<WH6808> shall speedily<WH4116> be freed;<WH6605> and he shall not die<WH4191> and go down into the pit,<WH7845> neither shall his bread<WH3899> fail.<WH2637>
For I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> who stirs<WH7280> up the sea,<WH3220> so that its waves<WH1530> roar:<WH1993> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> is his name.<WH8034>

I have put<WH7760> my words<WH1697> in your mouth,<WH6310> and have covered<WH3680> you in the shadow<WH6738> of my hand,<WH3027> that I may plant<WH5193> the heavens,<WH8064> and lay the foundations<WH3245> of the earth,<WH776> and tell<WH559> Zion,<WH6726> <WH5971> 'You are my people.'"

Awake,<WH5782> awake,<WH5782> stand up,<WH6965> Jerusalem,<WH3389> that have drunk<WH8354> at the hand<WH3027> of Yahweh<WH3068> the cup<WH3563> of his wrath;<WH2534> you have drunken<WH8354> the bowl<WH6907> of the cup<WH3563> of staggering,<WH8653> and drained it.<WH4680>

There is none to guide<WH5095> her among all the sons<WH1121> whom she has brought forth;<WH3205> neither is there any who takes<WH2388> her by the hand<WH3027> among all the sons<WH1121> who she has brought up.<WH1431>

These two<WH8147> things have happened<WH7122> to you.<WH5110> Who will bemoan you?<WH7701> Desolation and destruction,<WH7667> and the famine<WH7458> and the sword;<WH2719> how shall I comfort you?<WH5162>

Your sons<WH1121> have fainted,<WH5968> they lie<WH7901> at the head<WH7218> of all the streets,<WH2351> as an antelope<WH8377> in a net;<WH4364> they are full<WH4392> of the wrath<WH2534> of Yahweh,<WH3068> the rebuke<WH1606> of your God.<WH430>
Therefore hear<WH8085> now this,<WH6041> you afflicted, and drunken,<WH7937> but not with wine:<WH3196>

Thus says<WH559> your Lord<WH113> Yahweh,<WH3068> and your God<WH430> who pleads<WH7378> the cause of his people,<WH5971> "Behold,<WH3947> I have taken out of your hand<WH3027> the cup<WH3563> of staggering,<WH8653> even the bowl<WH6907> of the cup<WH3563> of my wrath;<WH2534> you shall no more<WH3254> drink it again:<WH8354>

and I will put<WH7760> it into the hand<WH3027> of those who afflict<WH3013> you,<WH559> who have said to your soul,<WH5315> <WH7812> 'Bow down, that we may walk over<WH5674> you;<WH7760>' and you have laid your back<WH1460> as the ground,<WH776> and as the street,<WH2351> to those who walk over.<WH5674>"
